content.question: The function f is defined by f(x) = 3x - 4cos (2x + 1), and its derivative is f'(x) = 3 + 8 sin(2x + 1). What are all values of x that satisfy the conclusion of the Mean Value Theorem applied to f on the interval [-1, 2 ] ?

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Provide reasons or rationales for solutions and conclusions.
